bug.author: WillNichols726
bug.summary: Scalar series labels in compare adding random html after action
bug.description:
The series labels start out ok, but the moment I do anything (zoom, hover, etc.) the random html appears. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45394583/80713452-76857380-8ac1-11ea-9ad3-1534ffd91d76.png></denchmark-link>
Trains 0.14.1 Browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:75.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/75.0

comments.comment: Clarification, it only appears when I zoom using Ctrl+ScrollWheel

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/WillNichols726>@WillNichols726</denchmark-link>
The bug is verified, I can reproduce it on Firefox and on Chrome, regardless of the host OS. A quick fix: once you are done with zooming the page, if you refresh the page, the legend will go back to normal. BTW, I was only able to reproduce this behavior by changing the zoom of the entire page (with either ctrl+wheel or ctrl+plus/minus) What did you mean by "the moment I do anything (zoom, hover, etc.)"? Hover seems to work for me, and also enabling/disabling a specific series on the graph...

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bmartinn>@bmartinn</denchmark-link> As per my second comment, I only see the bug when doing whole page zooms. And as always, thanks again for such an awesome ML platform!
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/WillNichols726>@WillNichols726</denchmark-link> , I forgot to update here, the bug was fixed in v0.15 :) Feel free to test on the demo server
